A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The only reason this film isn't getting a rock bottom rating from me is the aesthetics. 

Everything else about the film was cheap and insulting to watch. I felt like I was being presented an up jumped puppet show. 

The idea behind the film is to sweep away the old and make way for a new story\, and these new characters are nothing to write home about\, let me tell you. 

The characters introduced in Episode 7 and 8 are boring\, vapid\, empty\, unrelatable annoying and most importantly nonsensical. 

The story is all of those things\, in spades. By the end of Episode 8 you aren't sure what's worse\, the fact you don't remember what the hell just happened or the fact you really don't care. 

Everything else about the film\, no matter whether it was well done or not- coasts on the coat tales of former glory. Unconvincing and uninspiring. 

It would have been one very tall order had someone told me the coming Star Wars films could be worse than the prequels but boy\, did they deliver.
